node_modules/@vercel/postgres.deprecated: @vercel/postgres is deprecated. If you are setting up a new database, you can choose an alternate storage solution from the Vercel Marketplace. If you had an existing Vercel Postgres database, it should have been migrated to Neon as a native Vercel integration. You can find more details and the guide to migrate to Neon's SDKs here: https://neon.com/docs/guides/vercel-postgres-transition-guide
